page.title: 20The Bell, Purleigh
page.content:
For nearly two years now Kirsten and Julian have been running The Bell. Over that time they have developed the pub offering with an excellent menu (further enhanced by an excellent chef). Very pleasant staff and surroundings make this an ideal location for a meal or a great Sunday Lunch..

A recommendation to you to come and try for yourself

I do miss farmers Ales, when they are not on tap!
Carlos
